description:
Set amidst a lovely, quiet street and adjacent to beautiful, bespoke properties is a prized parcel of land at 81 Lilly Street. This 503sqm level allotment is cleared and available now, providing an exciting opportunity to build your dream property in the sought-after, family suburb of Sherwood. Features include:

• Level allotment - easy to build on
• Flood free
• Block dimensions – 10m frontage and 50.1m length
• Fully serviced with water and sewerage connections completed
• School catchment – Sherwood State School, Corinda State High School
• Walking distance to St Aidan's Anglican Girls' School
• Sherwood Train Station 500m walking distance and provides easy access to Brisbane Boy's College, St Peter's Lutheran College and short ride to Brisbane CBD
• Close to Indooroopilly Westfield Shopping Centre, Rocklea Market's, golf courses plus easy access to both Centenary and Ipswich motorways

Just 9km from Brisbane CBD, Sherwood is a suburb you will relish calling home. With mature, tree-lined streets and a friendly, community atmosphere, this position is within minutes to Sherwood Arboretum and it's 15 HA of parkland, local shops, restaurants and cafes, medical centres, post office and a multitude of local and quality schooling options. Do not miss this exciting opportunity – call now to discuss further!
